nodes.text: Talia v'laenya was a female Bothan spy who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Early during the conflict, she joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic and was a member of the Alliance Spy Network. However, she left the organization due to "unresolved differences" prior to the Battle of Yavin. Around 1 ABY, she operated out of Nym's Stronghold on Lok. There, she encountered a spacer and provided information about Kimogila Town and the Canyon Corsair's Stronghold.

Talia v'laenya was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
